name: CameraMan: Modus Operandi
description:
CameraMan: Modus Operandi is a short game (or proof of game concept at this stage) created for the Beginners Circle Jam #4.

A mediocre game show is happening live and the producer had to step away for a bathroom break. You're in charge in selecting which screen the public sees. Maximize the rating score profit by selecting the right screen at the right time!
